actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations, S. Rept. 95-275.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relating to the final act of the conference on security and cooperation in Europe.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the Congress that the United States delegation to the Belgrade Conference insure that the conference agenda provides for an exchange of views on the application of the Final Act of the Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe, including discussion of all violations of the Final Act.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relating to the final act of the conference on security and cooperation in Europe.
